name: @raconteur-media/desing-tokens
description: A package to distrubbute Raconteur Media designn tokens

scripts.dsm:to-theme-es: invision-dsm-utils transform src/style-data.json dist/rac-dsm-theme.js && cp src/style-data.json dist/rac-dsm-theme.json
scripts.theme:init: cp src/raconteur-theme.js dist/index.js && npx babel --plugins @babel/plugin-transform-modules-commonjs dist/index.js -o dist/index.cjs
scripts.theme:pretty: npx prettier --write dist/index.scss && npx prettier --write dist/index.json
scripts.theme: run-s theme:init theme:sass theme:json theme:cssvars theme:pretty

author: Nicola Pernice
